import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { useSelector,useDispatch} from 'react-redux' import Container from "react-bootstrap/Container"; import Row from "react-bootstrap/Row"; import Col from "react-bootstrap/Col"; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome'; import { faPlusCircle,faTimesCircle,faEdit } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons'; import "./Quizzes.css"; import QuestionBox from "./QuestionBox.js" import {getQuizzes} from '../../../../js/actions/quizaction' export default function Quizzes() { const {isLoading,quizzes} = useSelector(state=> state.qs) const dispatch =useDispatch(); const getAllQuizzes = ()=> dispatch(getQuizzes()) useEffect(()=>{ getAllQuizzes() },[]) const [addQuest, setAddQuest] = useState(false) const [isModif, setIsModif] = useState(false) const [isform, setIsForm] = useState({ name:"", category:"", }) const handleChangeEdit =(id)=>{ setIsModif(true) } return (
